Chinese (simplified): 非常有可能，是的。@p9 我找到了最后可用的桥梁协议。@w5 虽然部分被破坏：@p9 2473年7月26日 @w2 本纳上将 @w2 默塞尔指挥官 @p9 [M] 先生！我们不能再等了。@w3 未知的敌人正在集结越来越多的舰船。@w4 我们已经失去了两艘运输船，泰坦号将没有机会。@w6 请，前往穿梭机！@p9 [Bn] 默塞尔，这不是你的指挥。@w4 走开 @w2 并带上亚登。@w3 我们必须调查进入这个系统时发现的异常。@w6 我会向GRAND上的佩雷斯上将报告。@p9 [M] 我们应该怎么办..？@p9 < 巨大爆炸声 > @p9 < 日志损坏 > @p9 [Bn] 我是本纳上将！@w3 所有人员，弃船！@w4 我重复。@w2 弃船！@w2 泰坦号已经失去！@w2 所有人员前往救生舱！@p9 [Bn] GRAND和其余舰队将在任何分钟内跳跃。我重... @p9 @p9 [Bn] THEIA！@w2 建立联系到 @w3 @w2 .. 建立联系到GRAND。@p9 [THEIA] 我们只能发送，副上将。@w4 联系建立！@p9 [Bn] 佩雷斯.. 听着 .. @w2 我没有多少时间了。@w4 我们正在将敌人从你那里拉开！@w4 .. 我们已经侦测到了古..遗迹！@w4 一个行星残骸！@w4 波前..起源于那里！@w5 我们需要..远离.. @p9 < 消息结束 >

Français: En attente de l'entrée de l'utilisateur.

English:
Dear visitor.

DESC provides hover vehicles and small spaceships for you to use. Please treat them with care and beware of the local <color=#ffffff>marauders</color>. Damage will be charged to your client. 

The available vehicles are <color=#ffffff>parked in front of the facility</color>.
Deutsch:
Lieber Besucher.

DESC stellt dir Schwebefahrzeuge und kleine Raumschiffe zur Verfügung. Bitte behandeln Sie diese mit Vorsicht und hüten Sie sich vor den örtlichen <color=#ffffff>Marodeuren</color>. Schäden werden Ihrem Auftraggeber in Rechnung gestellt. 

Die verfügbaren Fahrzeuge sind <color=#ffffff>vor der Einrichtung geparkt</color>.
Français: Cher visiteur.\n- LeDESC met à votre disposition des véhicules volants et de petits vaisseaux spatiaux. Veuillez les traiter avec soin et vous méfier des <color=#ffffff>maraudeurs</color> locaux. Les dommages seront facturés à votre client. \nLes véhicules disponibles sont <color=#ffffff>parqués devant l'établissement</color>.
Italiano: Caro visitatore.\nDESC ti mette a disposizione dei veicoli a sospensione e delle piccole astronavi da utilizzare. Ti preghiamo di trattarli con cura e di fare attenzione ai <color=#ffff>marauder locali</color>. I danni saranno addebitati al tuo cliente. \nI veicoli disponibili sono <color=#ffffff>parcheggiati davanti alla struttura</color>.
Spanish: Estimado visitante: El CESE pone a tu disposición vehículos aerodeslizadores y pequeñas naves espaciales. Por favor, trátalos con cuidado y ten cuidado con los <color=#ffffff>marauders</color> locales. Los daños se cargarán a tu cliente. \nLos vehículos disponibles están <color=#ffffff>aparcados frente a las instalaciones</color>.
Portuguese (Brazil):
Caro visitante.

O CESE fornece veículos flutuantes e pequenas naves espaciais para você usar. Por favor, trate-os com cuidado e tome cuidado com os <color=#ffffffff>marauders</color> locais. Os danos serão cobrados de seu cliente. 
Os veículos disponíveis estão <color=#ffffff>estacionados em frente às instalações</color>.
Russian:
Дорогой посетитель.

DESC предоставляет вам воздушные транспортные средства и небольшие космические корабли. Пожалуйста, обращайся с ними осторожно и остерегайся местных <color=#ffffff>мародеров</color>. Ущерб будет выставлен на счет твоего клиента. 

Доступные транспортные средства <color=#ffffff>припаркованы перед объектом</color>.
Chinese (simplified): 亲爱的访客，DESC 提供悬浮车和小型飞船供您使用。请小心对待它们，并提防当地的<color=#ffffffff>掠夺者</color>。损坏将由您的客户承担。\n可用车辆<color=#ffffffff>停在设施前面</color>。

Portuguese (Brazil): Sistema de controle do Posto Avançado 34

English: Hello, my dear friend! @w2 IDA has already sent over all the information you recently found about the <color=#ffffff>Talon-Zirax Assembly</color> and the <color=#ffffff>War of Silence</color>. Things are starting to make sense, although the information is extremely fragmented. Our analysts will need some time to put things in the correct context of the big picture. This will definitely shake up this sector, @w4, and then ... @w2 the Galaxy! \n\nFor now .. please fly to the <color=#fbff00>Sigma Beta</color> asteroid field in the <color=#fbff00>Sigma Zero</color> system. Time to meet in person!
Deutsch: Hallo, mein lieber Freund! @w2 IDA hat dir bereits alle Informationen geschickt, die du kürzlich über die <color=#ffffff>Talon-Zirax-Versammlung</color> und den <color=#ffffff>Krieg des Schweigens</color> gefunden hast. Die Dinge fangen an, einen Sinn zu ergeben, auch wenn die Informationen extrem bruchstückhaft sind. Unsere Analysten werden einige Zeit brauchen, um die Dinge in den richtigen Kontext des großen Ganzen zu stellen. Das wird definitiv diesen Sektor aufrütteln, @w4, und dann ... @w2 die Galaxie! \n\nFür den Moment ... fliegen Sie bitte zum <color=#fbff00>Sigma Beta</color> Asteroidenfeld im <color=#fbff00>Sigma Zero</color> System. Zeit für ein persönliches Treffen!
Français: Bonjour, mon cher ami ! @w2 IDA vous a déjà envoyé toutes les informations que vous avez récemment trouvées sur le <color=#ffff>Talon-Zirax Assembly</color> et la <color=#ffff>War of Silence</color>. Les choses commencent à prendre sens, bien que les informations soient extrêmement fragmentées. Nos analystes auront besoin d'un peu de temps pour remettre les choses dans le bon contexte. Cela va certainement secouer ce secteur, @w4, et ensuite ... @w2 la galaxie ! \nPour l'instant, veuillez vous rendre au champ d'astéroïdes <color=#fbff00>Sigma Beta</color> dans le système <color=#fbff00>Sigma Zero</color>. Il est temps de se rencontrer en personne !
Italiano: Ciao, mio caro amico! @w2 IDA ti ha già inviato tutte le informazioni che hai trovato di recente sull'<color=#ffff>Assemblaggio Talon-Zirax</color> e sulla <color=#ffff>Guerra del Silenzio</color>. Le cose cominciano ad avere un senso, anche se le informazioni sono estremamente frammentate. I nostri analisti avranno bisogno di un po' di tempo per inserire le cose nel giusto contesto del quadro generale. Questo scuoterà sicuramente questo settore, @w4, e poi... @w2 la Galassia! \nPer ora, ti preghiamo di volare verso il campo di asteroidi <color=#fbff00>Sigma Beta</color> nel sistema <color=#fbff00>Sigma Zero</color>. È ora di incontrarsi di persona!
Spanish: ¡Hola, querido amigo! @w2 IDA ya te ha enviado toda la información que has encontrado recientemente sobre la <color=#ffffff>Asamblea Talon-Zirax</color> y la <color=#ffffff>Guerra del Silencio</color>. Las cosas empiezan a tener sentido, aunque la información está muy fragmentada. Nuestros analistas necesitarán algún tiempo para situar las cosas en el contexto correcto del panorama general. Esto sacudirá definitivamente este sector, @w4, y después... ¡@w2 la Galaxia! \nPor ahora... vuela al campo de asteroides <color=#fbff00>Sigma Beta</color> del sistema <color=#fbff00>Sigma Cero</color>. ¡Es hora de conocernos en persona!
Portuguese (Brazil): Olá, meu caro amigo! A @w2 IDA já enviou todas as informações que você encontrou recentemente sobre a <color=#ffffffff>Montagem de Talon-Zirax</color> e a <color=#ffffffff>Guerra do Silêncio</color>. As coisas estão começando a fazer sentido, embora as informações sejam extremamente fragmentadas. Nossos analistas precisarão de algum tempo para colocar as coisas no contexto correto do quadro geral. Isso definitivamente abalará esse setor, @w4, e depois... @w2 a Galáxia! \nPor enquanto... por favor, voe até o campo de asteroides <color=#fbff00>Sigma Beta</color> no sistema <color=#fbff00>Sigma Zero</color>. É hora de você se encontrar pessoalmente!
Russian: Здравствуй, мой дорогой друг! @w2 IDA уже передал всю найденную тобой информацию о <color=#ffffff>Сборке Талон-Зиракс</color> и <color=#ffffff>Войне Молчания</color>. Все начинает приобретать смысл, хотя информация крайне фрагментарна. Нашим аналитикам потребуется некоторое время, чтобы вписать все в правильный контекст общей картины. Это определенно всколыхнет этот сектор, @w4, а затем ... @w2 Галактику! \nА пока... пожалуйста, летите к астероидному полю <color=#fbff00>Сигма Бета</color> в системе <color=#fbff00>Сигма Зеро</color>. Пора встретиться лично!
Chinese (simplified): 你好，我亲爱的朋友！@w2 IDA 已经将你最近发现的有关<color=#ffffff>塔隆-齐拉克斯装配</color>和<color=#ffffff>沉默之战</color>的所有信息发送过来了。虽然信息非常零散，但事情开始变得有意义了。我们的分析师需要一些时间来正确理解事情的来龙去脉。这肯定会撼动这个领域，@w4，然后...... @w2 the Galaxy！\n现在......请飞到<color=#fbff00>西格玛零</color>系统中的<color=#fbff00>西格玛贝塔</color>小行星区。是时候见面了！

Français: Seulement les faits, s'il vous plaît (<color=#ffffff>Skip</color>)

English: Just a summary of what we know. (<color=#ffffff>Skip</color>)
Deutsch: Nur eine Zusammenfassung von dem, was wir wissen. (<color=#ffffff>Skip</color>)
Français: Juste un résumé de ce que nous savons. (<color=#ffff>Skip</color>)
Italiano: Solo un riassunto di ciò che sappiamo. (<color=#ffff>Skip</color>)
Spanish: Sólo un resumen de lo que sabemos. (<color=#ffffff>Skip</color>)
Portuguese (Brazil): Apenas um resumo do que sabemos. (<color=#ffffffff>Skip</color>)
Russian: Только краткое изложение того, что мы знаем. (<color=#ffffff>Skip</color>)

English: @q0Hm, let's see: @w2 The Talon seem to have been refugees, fleeing from the Triangulum galaxy. Fleeing from something that we know as 'The Legacy'. Still have no idea what that exactly is, but it seems to be able to infect, control, and even convert biological beings and machines. Pentaxid, the fuel of our warp drives, and many other things, seems to play a role. The Ilmarinen, which you visited lately, was captured this way when the unlucky crew dug up a part of an infected pentaxid asteroid and brought it on board. Bad idea. That's all we know about the Legacy so far. @p9 On the Talon topic: Your latest information indicates, that after the Talon arrived in Andromeda, they fell back into barbarism, but then made it back to space in a short amount of time. They found and raised the Zirax and, because the Talon were more the brains than the muscles, the Zirax grew into the role of the latter. After some decades of peace, the War of Silence started when the Legacy managed to follow the Talon to Andromeda. @p9 We do not yet know how this happened or how the war actually ended, but as far as we can say, the outcome was that the Talon were nearly eradicated from Andromeda. Not by the Legacy, but by the Zirax. That's another place where we still do not have a lot of information- why this turned out as it did. Your finding of that cryogenized Talon prisoner named Kar'han indicates that the Zirax turned against their century-long allies all of a sudden. @p9 What we also know is that The Legacy was defeated, but not destroyed when the War of Silence ended. And it seems as though that entity is coming back, even now, as you, and others, have already found out firsthand. @p9 Taking all that into account, there is one thing that does not make much sense, at least to us: The Talon would seem to still be technically capable of doing next-to-magical things, but those that are capable are hiding their knowledge even from their own tribes. We have been working with them for nearly a year, but they still keep it a secret- why do they not use their abilities to their full extent? If you ask me, this is a bit suspicious. It's as if they are waiting for something.
Deutsch: @q0Hm, mal sehen: @w2 Die Talon scheinen Flüchtlinge gewesen zu sein, die aus der Galaxie Triangulum geflohen sind. Sie flohen vor etwas, das wir als 'Das Vermächtnis' kennen. Wir haben immer noch keine Ahnung, was das genau ist, aber es scheint in der Lage zu sein, biologische Wesen und Maschinen zu infizieren, zu kontrollieren und sogar umzuwandeln. Pentaxid, der Treibstoff unseres Warpantriebs, und viele andere Dinge scheinen eine Rolle zu spielen. Die Ilmarinen, die Sie kürzlich besucht haben, wurde auf diese Weise gefangen genommen, als die unglückliche Besatzung einen Teil eines infizierten Pentaxid-Asteroiden ausgrub und an Bord brachte. Schlechte Idee. Das ist alles, was wir bis jetzt über das Vermächtnis wissen. @p9 Zum Thema Talon: Deine letzten Informationen deuten darauf hin, dass die Talon nach ihrer Ankunft in Andromeda in die Barbarei zurückfielen, es dann aber in kurzer Zeit zurück in den Weltraum schafften. Sie fanden die Zirax und zogen sie auf, und da die Talon eher das Gehirn als die Muskeln waren, übernahmen die Zirax die Rolle der letzteren. Nach einigen Jahrzehnten des Friedens begann der Krieg des Schweigens, als es dem Vermächtnis gelang, den Talon nach Andromeda zu folgen. @p9 Wir wissen noch nicht, wie es dazu kam und wie der Krieg tatsächlich endete, aber soweit wir sagen können, war das Ergebnis, dass die Talon in Andromeda fast ausgerottet wurden. Nicht durch das Vermächtnis, sondern durch die Zirax. Das ist ein weiterer Punkt, über den wir noch nicht viel wissen - warum es so gekommen ist, wie es gekommen ist. Dein Fund des kryogenisierten Talon-Gefangenen namens Kar'han deutet darauf hin, dass sich die Zirax plötzlich gegen ihre jahrhundertelangen Verbündeten wenden. @p9 Wir wissen auch, dass das Vermächtnis zwar besiegt, aber nicht zerstört wurde, als der Krieg des Schweigens endete. Und es sieht so aus, als würde dieses Wesen zurückkehren, sogar jetzt, wie du und andere bereits aus erster Hand erfahren haben. @p9 Wenn man all das berücksichtigt, gibt es eine Sache, die zumindest für uns nicht viel Sinn ergibt: Die Talon scheinen technisch immer noch in der Lage zu sein, nahezu magische Dinge zu tun, aber diejenigen, die dazu in der Lage sind, verbergen ihr Wissen sogar vor ihren eigenen Stämmen. Wir arbeiten schon seit fast einem Jahr mit ihnen zusammen, aber sie halten es immer noch geheim - warum nutzen sie ihre Fähigkeiten nicht in vollem Umfang? Wenn ihr mich fragt, ist das ein wenig verdächtig. Es ist, als ob sie auf etwas warten würden.
Français: @q0Hm, voyons voir : @w2 Les Talon semblent avoir été des réfugiés, fuyant la galaxie du Triangle. Ils ont fui quelque chose que nous appelons 'l'héritage'. Nous n'avons toujours aucune idée de ce que c'est exactement, mais il semble être capable d'infecter, de contrôler et même de convertir des êtres biologiques et des machines. Le Pentaxid, le carburant de nos moteurs de distorsion, et bien d'autres choses, semble jouer un rôle. L'Ilmarinen, que vous avez visité récemment, a été capturé de cette façon lorsque l'équipage malchanceux a déterré une partie d'un astéroïde pentaxide infecté et l'a apporté à bord. Mauvaise idée. C'est tout ce que nous savons sur le Legacy pour l'instant. @p9 Sur le sujet du Talon : Vos dernières informations indiquent qu'après l'arrivée des Talon dans Andromède, ils sont retombés dans la barbarie, mais qu'ils ont regagné l'espace en peu de temps. Ils ont trouvé et élevé les Zirax et, comme les Talon étaient plus des cerveaux que des muscles, les Zirax se sont développés dans le rôle de ces derniers. Après quelques décennies de paix, la Guerre du Silence a commencé lorsque l'Héritage a réussi à suivre le Talon jusqu'à Andromède. Nous ne savons pas encore comment cela s'est passé ni comment la guerre s'est terminée, mais pour autant que nous puissions le dire, le résultat a été que les Talon ont été presque éradiqués d'Andromède. Pas par l'Héritage, mais par les Zirax. C'est un autre point sur lequel nous n'avons pas beaucoup d'informations, pourquoi cela s'est passé comme ça. Votre découverte du prisonnier cryogénisé de Talon nommé Kar'han indique que les Zirax se sont soudainement retournés contre leurs alliés d'il y a un siècle. Nous savons aussi que l'Héritage a été vaincu, mais pas détruit, à la fin de la Guerre du Silence. Et il semble que cette entité revienne, même aujourd'hui, comme vous, et d'autres, l'avez déjà découvert de première main. En tenant compte de tout cela, il y a une chose qui n'a pas beaucoup de sens, du moins pour nous : Les Talon semblent toujours techniquement capables de faire des choses presque magiques, mais ceux qui en sont capables cachent leurs connaissances, même à leurs propres tribus. Nous travaillons avec eux depuis près d'un an, mais ils gardent toujours le secret. Pourquoi n'utilisent-ils pas toutes leurs capacités ? Si vous voulez mon avis, c'est un peu suspect. C'est comme s'ils attendaient quelque chose.
Italiano: @q0Hm, vediamo: @w2 I Talon sembrano essere stati dei rifugiati, in fuga dalla galassia di Triangulum. In fuga da qualcosa che conosciamo come 'L'Eredità'. Non abbiamo ancora idea di cosa sia esattamente, ma sembra che sia in grado di infettare, controllare e persino convertire esseri biologici e macchine. Il Pentaxid, il carburante dei nostri motori a curvatura e molte altre cose, sembra avere un ruolo importante. L'Ilmarinen, che hai visitato di recente, è stata catturata in questo modo quando lo sfortunato equipaggio ha dissotterrato una parte di un asteroide pentaxide infetto e l'ha portata a bordo. Pessima idea. Questo è tutto ciò che sappiamo della Legacy per ora. @p9 Per quanto riguarda l'argomento Talon: Le tue ultime informazioni indicano che, dopo l'arrivo dei Talon su Andromeda, sono ricaduti nella barbarie, ma poi sono tornati nello spazio in breve tempo. Trovarono e allevarono gli Zirax e, poiché i Talon erano più cervelli che muscoli, gli Zirax assunsero il ruolo di questi ultimi. Dopo alcuni decenni di pace, la Guerra del Silenzio ebbe inizio quando l'Eredità riuscì a seguire i Talon fino ad Andromeda. @p9 Non sappiamo ancora come sia successo e come sia finita la guerra, ma per quanto possiamo dire, il risultato fu che i Talon furono quasi sradicati da Andromeda. Non dalla Legacy, ma dagli Zirax. Questo è un altro punto su cui non abbiamo ancora molte informazioni: perché le cose sono andate come sono andate. Il ritrovamento del prigioniero criogenico dei Talon di nome Kar'han indica che gli Zirax si sono rivoltati all'improvviso contro i loro alleati di un secolo. @p9 Sappiamo anche che l'Eredità è stata sconfitta, ma non distrutta quando la Guerra del Silenzio è terminata. E sembra che quell'entità stia tornando, anche adesso, come tu e altri avete già scoperto in prima persona. @p9 Tenendo conto di tutto questo, c'è una cosa che non ha molto senso, almeno per noi: I Talon sembrano essere ancora tecnicamente in grado di fare cose quasi magiche, ma quelli che sono in grado di farlo nascondono le loro conoscenze persino alle loro stesse tribù. Lavoriamo con loro da quasi un anno, ma continuano a mantenere il segreto: perché non sfruttano appieno le loro capacità? Secondo me, questo è un po' sospetto. È come se stessero aspettando qualcosa.
Spanish: @q0Hm, veamos: @w2 Los Talon parecen haber sido refugiados, huyendo de la galaxia Triangulum. Huyendo de algo que conocemos como 'El Legado'. Aún no tenemos ni idea de qué es exactamente, pero parece ser capaz de infectar, controlar e incluso convertir a seres biológicos y máquinas. El pentaxido, el combustible de nuestros motores warp, y muchas otras cosas, parece desempeñar un papel. El Ilmarinen, que has visitado últimamente, fue capturado de esta forma cuando la desafortunada tripulación desenterró una parte de un asteroide pentaxid infectado y lo subió a bordo. Mala idea. Eso es todo lo que sabemos del Legado hasta ahora. @p9 Sobre el tema del Talon: Tu última información indica que, después de que los Talon llegaran a Andrómeda, cayeron en la barbarie, pero consiguieron volver al espacio en poco tiempo. Encontraron y criaron a los Zirax y, como los Talon eran más el cerebro que los músculos, los Zirax se convirtieron en estos últimos. Tras algunas décadas de paz, la Guerra del Silencio comenzó cuando el Legado consiguió seguir al Talón hasta Andrómeda. @p9 Aún no sabemos cómo ocurrió esto ni cómo terminó realmente la guerra, pero por lo que podemos decir, el resultado fue que los Talon fueron casi erradicados de Andrómeda. No por el Legado, sino por los Zirax. Ése es otro punto en el que aún no tenemos mucha información: por qué resultó así. Tu hallazgo de ese prisionero Talon criogenizado llamado Kar'han indica que los Zirax se volvieron de repente contra sus aliados de un siglo. @p9 Lo que también sabemos es que El Legado fue derrotado, pero no destruido, cuando terminó la Guerra del Silencio. Y parece que esa entidad está regresando, incluso ahora, como tú, y otros, ya habéis comprobado de primera mano. @p9 Teniendo todo eso en cuenta, hay algo que no tiene mucho sentido, al menos para nosotros: Parece que los Talon siguen siendo técnicamente capaces de hacer cosas casi mágicas, pero los que son capaces ocultan sus conocimientos incluso a sus propias tribus. Llevamos casi un año trabajando con ellos, pero siguen manteniéndolo en secreto: ¿por qué no utilizan sus capacidades en toda su extensión? En mi opinión, esto es un poco sospechoso. Es como si estuvieran esperando algo.
Portuguese (Brazil): @q0Hm, vamos ver: @w2 Os Talon parecem ter sido refugiados, fugindo da galáxia Triangulum. Fugindo de algo que conhecemos como 'O Legado'. Ainda não tenho ideia do que seja exatamente, mas parece ser capaz de infectar, controlar e até mesmo converter seres biológicos e máquinas. O pentaxídeo, o combustível de nossos motores de dobra e muitas outras coisas, parece ter um papel importante. A Ilmarinen, que você visitou recentemente, foi capturada dessa forma quando a infeliz tripulação desenterrou uma parte de um asteroide pentaxídeo infectado e a trouxe para bordo. Má ideia. Isso é tudo o que sabemos sobre o Legacy até o momento. @p9 Sobre o tópico da Talon: Suas últimas informações indicam que, depois que a Talon chegou a Andrômeda, eles voltaram à barbárie, mas conseguiram voltar ao espaço em pouco tempo. Eles encontraram e criaram os Zirax e, como os Talon eram mais cérebros do que músculos, os Zirax assumiram o papel desses últimos. Após algumas décadas de paz, a Guerra do Silêncio começou quando o Legado conseguiu seguir os Talon até Andrômeda. Ainda não sabemos como isso aconteceu ou como a guerra realmente terminou, mas, até onde podemos dizer, o resultado foi que os Talon foram quase erradicados de Andrômeda. Não pelo Legado, mas pelos Zirax. Esse é outro ponto em que ainda não temos muitas informações - por que isso aconteceu. O fato de você ter encontrado o prisioneiro criogenizado da Talon chamado Kar'han indica que os Zirax se voltaram contra seus aliados de um século de repente. O que também sabemos é que o Legado foi derrotado, mas não destruído, quando a Guerra do Silêncio terminou. E parece que essa entidade está voltando, mesmo agora, como você e outros já descobriram em primeira mão. Levando tudo isso em consideração, há uma coisa que não faz muito sentido, pelo menos para nós: A Talon parece ainda ser tecnicamente capaz de fazer coisas quase mágicas, mas aqueles que são capazes estão escondendo seu conhecimento até mesmo de suas próprias tribos. Estamos trabalhando com eles há quase um ano, mas eles ainda mantêm segredo - por que não usam suas habilidades em toda a sua extensão? Se você me perguntar, isso é um pouco suspeito. É como se eles estivessem esperando por algo.
Russian: @q0Хм, давайте посмотрим: @w2 Тэлон, похоже, были беженцами, бежавшими из галактики Триангулум. Бежали от чего-то, что мы знаем как 'Наследие'. Мы до сих пор не знаем, что это такое, но, похоже, оно способно заражать, контролировать и даже преобразовывать биологические существа и машины. Пентаксид, топливо для наших варп-двигателей и многих других вещей, похоже, играет в этом не последнюю роль. Корабль 'Ильмаринен', на котором вы недавно побывали, был захвачен таким образом, когда неудачливый экипаж откопал часть зараженного пентаксидом астероида и взял его на борт. Плохая идея. Это пока все, что мы знаем о 'Наследии'. @p9 По теме Talon: Ваша последняя информация указывает на то, что после прибытия Тэлона на Андромеду, они снова впали в варварство, но затем за короткое время вернулись в космос. Они нашли и вырастили Зираксов, и, поскольку Тэлон были скорее мозгом, чем мышцами, Зираксы выросли в роли последних. После нескольких десятилетий мира началась Война Молчания, когда Наследию удалось проследить за Тэлоном до Андромеды. Мы пока не знаем, как это произошло и чем закончилась война, но, насколько мы можем судить, в результате Тэлон были практически уничтожены на Андромеде. Не Наследием, а Зираксом. Это еще одно место, где мы до сих пор не располагаем достаточной информацией - почему все сложилось именно так, как сложилось. То, что вы нашли криогенизированного пленника Талона по имени Кар'хан, указывает на то, что Зиракс внезапно обратился против своих вековых союзников. Мы также знаем, что Наследие было побеждено, но не уничтожено, когда закончилась Война Молчания. И похоже, что эта сущность возвращается, даже сейчас, как вы, и другие, уже убедились на собственном опыте. @p9 Принимая во внимание все это, есть одна вещь, которая не имеет особого смысла, по крайней мере, для нас: Талон, похоже, по-прежнему технически способен делать почти магические вещи, но те, кто способен, скрывают свои знания даже от своих собственных племен. Мы работаем с ними уже почти год, но они все еще держат это в секрете - почему же они не используют свои способности в полной мере? Как по мне, это немного подозрительно. Как будто они чего-то ждут.
Chinese (simplified): @q0嗯，让我看看： @w2 塔伦人似乎是从三角座星系逃出来的难民。逃离我们所知的 '遗产'。我们仍然不知道那到底是什么，但它似乎能够感染、控制、甚至转换生物和机器。我们翘曲驱动器的燃料 Pentaxid 和许多其他东西似乎都在其中扮演了角色。你最近造访过的伊尔马利宁号就是这样被捕获的，当时倒霉的船员挖出了一部分被感染的五倍子小行星，并把它带到了船上。馊主意 这就是我们目前所知道的关于 '遗产 '的一切。@p9 关于塔伦号的话题： 你的最新信息表明，塔伦人到达仙女座后，又陷入了野蛮状态，但在很短的时间内又回到了太空。他们发现并养育了齐拉克斯人，由于塔伦人更多的是大脑而不是肌肉，齐拉克斯人逐渐扮演了后者的角色。经过数十年的和平，当 '遗产 '成功跟随 '塔伦 '到达仙女座时，'沉默之战 '开始了。我们还不知道战争是如何发生的，也不知道战争是如何结束的，但就我们所知，战争的结果是塔伦人几乎被从仙女座消灭了。不是被 '遗产'，而是被 '齐拉克斯'。这也是我们还不了解的地方 为什么会变成这样? 你发现的那个名叫卡尔汉的冷冻塔伦囚犯表明，奇拉克斯人突然转向反对他们的百年盟友。@p9 我们还知道，当沉默战争结束时，'遗产 '被打败了，但并没有被摧毁。而且似乎那个实体又回来了，即使是现在，正如你和其他人已经亲身发现的那样。@p9 考虑到这一切，有一件事是说不通的，至少对我们来说是这样： 从技术上讲，塔伦人似乎仍有能力做出近乎神奇的事情，但那些有能力的人甚至对自己的部落都隐瞒了他们的知识。我们已经与他们合作了将近一年，但他们仍然对此保密--他们为什么不充分发挥自己的能力呢？要我说，这有点可疑。他们好像在等待什么。

Français: AI de l'arpenteur de la station
Spanish: IA del Topógrafo de la Estación

English: Welcome back! I hope the circumstances of the mission were not too unpleasant? I have handed over the technical artifacts to my staff for analysis. I expect interesting results that should bring us more information about Tesch and the VOID. Maybe it will even be a real breakthrough thanks to you!\n\nMore importantly, however, is the next task...
Deutsch: Willkommen zurück! Ich hoffe, die Umstände der Mission waren nicht zu unangenehm? Ich habe die technischen Artefakte an meine Mitarbeiter zur Analyse übergeben. Ich erwarte interessante Ergebnisse, die uns mehr Informationen über Tesch und das VOID liefern sollten. Vielleicht wird es sogar ein echter Durchbruch, dank Ihnen!\n\n Noch wichtiger ist jedoch die nächste Aufgabe...
Français: Bon retour parmi nous ! J'espère que les circonstances de la mission n'ont pas été trop désagréables ? J'ai remis les artefacts techniques à mon équipe pour qu'elle les analyse. Je m'attends à des résultats intéressants qui devraient nous apporter plus d'informations sur Tesch et le VOID. Peut-être même qu'il s'agira d'une véritable avancée grâce à vous ! \nPlus important, cependant, est la prochaine tâche...
Italiano: Bentornato! Spero che le circostanze della missione non siano state troppo spiacevoli. Ho consegnato i manufatti tecnici al mio staff perché li analizzi. Mi aspetto risultati interessanti che dovrebbero fornirci maggiori informazioni su Tesch e sul VOID. Forse, grazie a te, ci sarà una vera e propria svolta! Ma la cosa più importante è il prossimo compito...
Spanish: ¡Bienvenido de nuevo! Espero que las circunstancias de la misión no hayan sido demasiado desagradables. He entregado los artefactos técnicos a mi personal para que los analicen. Espero resultados interesantes que nos aporten más información sobre Tesch y el VOID. Tal vez incluso sea un verdadero avance gracias a ti! Sin embargo, lo más importante es la siguiente tarea...
Portuguese (Brazil): Bem-vindo de volta! Espero que as circunstâncias da missão não tenham sido muito desagradáveis. Entreguei os artefatos técnicos à minha equipe para análise. Espero resultados interessantes que devem nos trazer mais informações sobre Tesch e o VOID. Talvez seja até mesmo um verdadeiro avanço graças a você! O mais importante, no entanto, é a próxima tarefa...
Russian: С возвращением! Надеюсь, обстоятельства миссии были не слишком неприятными? Я передал технические артефакты своим сотрудникам для анализа. Я ожидаю интересных результатов, которые должны принести нам больше информации о Теше и VOID. Возможно, благодаря вам это даже станет настоящим прорывом!\n\n Однако более важным является следующее задание...
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎回来！我希望这次任务的情况不会太令人不快吧？我已经把技术文物交给我的工作人员进行分析了。我期待着有趣的结果，这些结果会给我们带来更多关于特斯克和 VOID 的信息。然而，更重要的是下一个任务...

English: What else would you like to know, Your Excellency?
Deutsch: Was möchten Sie noch wissen, Eure Exzellenz?
Portuguese (Brazil): O que mais você gostaria de saber, Excelência?
Russian: Что еще Вы хотели бы узнать, Ваше Превосходительство?

Deutsch: Können Sie mir etwas über die LEGACY erzählen?
Portuguese (Brazil): Você pode me dizer algo sobre o LEGACY?
Russian: Можете ли вы рассказать мне что-нибудь о LEGACY?
Chinese (simplified): 您能告诉我一些关于 LEGACY 的事情吗？

English: Can you tell me something about the Zirax Empire?
Deutsch: Können Sie mir etwas über das Zirax-Imperium sagen?
Français: Pouvez-vous me parler de l'Empire Zirax ?
Spanish: ¿Puedes decirme algo sobre el Imperio Zirax?
Portuguese (Brazil): Você pode me dizer algo sobre o Império Zirax?
Russian: Можете ли вы рассказать мне что-нибудь об Империи Зиракс?
Chinese (simplified): 您能告诉我一些关于齐拉克斯帝国的事情吗？

English: Is there a possibility to download that archive? (Skip)
Deutsch: Gibt es eine Möglichkeit, das Archiv herunterzuladen? (Skip)
Portuguese (Brazil): Existe a possibilidade de você fazer o download desse arquivo? (Skip)
Chinese (simplified): 有没有可能下载那个档案？（跳转）

Deutsch: Ich habe noch eine andere Frage.

English:
Commander! Your plan was a complete success. We have rescued all the prisoners. They are currently receiving medical treatment. 

I will take the GLaD members to the <color=#fbff00>Phoenix system</color> at their request. Alex told me to tell you to <u>meet them there</u> and not to take too long again. The <color=#fbff00>coordinates are marked</color> in your bookmarks. 

Good luck Commander. I have a feeling we'll see each other again soon!
Deutsch:
Hallo Commander {PlayerName}! Vielen Dank für die Rettung. Wir werden jedoch keine Zeit haben, sie zu feiern. Für unser aller Überleben ist es entscheidend, dass wir jetzt schnell handeln. Mach dir keine Sorgen, der Botschafter wird deine Freunde zur nächsten GLaD-Basis bringen. 

Doch müssen <color=#ffffff>Sie und ich</color> uns sofort auf <color=#fbff00>Omicron</color> im <color=#fbff00>Ellyon</color>System treffen. 

Verschwendet keine Zeit. Ich treffe dich dort!
Français: Bonjour Commandant {PlayerName} ! Merci de nous avoir secourus. Cependant, nous n'aurons pas le temps de le fêter. Pour notre survie, il est essentiel que nous agissions rapidement. Ne vous inquiétez pas, l'ambassadeur emmènera vos amis à la base GLaD la plus proche. \n- Cependant, <color=#ffffff>vous et moi</color> devons nous rencontrer sur <color=#fbff00>Omicron</color> dans le <color=#fbff00>sytem Ellyon </color>immédiatement. \nNe perdez pas de temps. Je vous retrouve là-bas !
Italiano:
Ciao Comandante {PlayerName}! Grazie per il salvataggio. Tuttavia, non avremo tempo per festeggiarlo. Per la sopravvivenza di tutti noi, è fondamentale agire rapidamente ora. Non preoccuparti, l'Ambasciatore porterà i tuoi amici alla base GLaD più vicina. 

Tuttavia, <color=#ffffff>tu ed io</color> dobbiamo incontrarci su <color=#fbff00>Omicron</color> nel sistema di <color=#fbff00>Ellyon</color> immediatamente. 

Non perdere tempo. Ti aspetto lì!
Spanish: ¡Hola Comandante {PlayerName}! Gracias por el rescate. Sin embargo, no tendremos tiempo de celebrarlo. Por nuestra supervivencia, es fundamental que actuemos con rapidez ahora. No te preocupes, el Embajador llevará a tus amigos a la base GLaD más cercana. \nSin embargo, <color=#ffffff>tú y yo</color> debemos reunirnos en <color=#fbff00>Omicron</color> en el sistema <color=#fbff00>Ellyon</color> inmediatamente. \nNo pierdas el tiempo. Nos vemos allí.
Portuguese (Brazil): Olá, comandante {PlayerName}! Obrigado a você pelo resgate. No entanto, não teremos tempo para comemorar. Para nossa sobrevivência, é fundamental que você aja rapidamente agora. Não se preocupe, o embaixador levará seus amigos para a base GLaD mais próxima. \no entanto, <color=#ffffff>você e eu</color> precisamos nos encontrar em <color=#fbff00>Omicron</color> no <color=#fbff00>sistema Ellyon</color> imediatamente. \não perca tempo. Eu encontro você lá!
Russian:
Привет, Командир {PlayerName}! Спасибо за спасение. Однако у нас не будет времени это отпраздновать. Для нашего выживания критически важно действовать быстро. Не переживай, Посол доставит твоих друзей на ближайшую базу GLaD. 

Однако, <color=#ffffff>ты и я</color> должны встретиться на <color=#fbff00>Омикроне</color> в системе <color=#fbff00>Эллион</color> немедленно. 

Не теряй времени. Встретимся там!
Chinese (simplified):
你好，指挥官 {PlayerName}！感谢你的救援。不过，我们没有时间庆祝了。为了我们所有人的生存，现在必须迅速行动。别担心，大使会把你的朋友们带到最近的GLaD基地。

然而，<color=#ffffff>你和我</color>必须立即在<color=#fbff00>Ellyon</color>系统的<color=#fbff00>Omicron</color>见面。

不要浪费时间。我会在那里见你！

Deutsch: Ich hoffe, er hat nur eine theatralische Ader...

Italiano: Spero che abbia solo una vena teatrale...
Spanish: Espero que sólo tenga una vena teatral...
Portuguese (Brazil): Espero que ele tenha apenas uma veia teatral...
Russian: Надеюсь, у него просто театральная жилка...
Chinese (simplified): 我希望他只是有戏剧天赋...

English:
Attention, unidentified vessel!

You are entering a restricted zone under DESC Regulation 245a, Section 5.

Identify yourself or vacate the solar system immediately

Look at this place! There are secrets in this place - I can feel it. There's a passage behind a destroyed terminal\nthat appears to lead further into the structure. I wanted to go take a look but been told to wait till we get more lights \ndown here.

Those creatures came out of no where. One of them killed Daryl before we know what was happening. Then more 
of them appeared and began chasing the others back towards the cargo lift. I was cut off and had no choice but to flee down
the passage way to escape.
 I've just climbed out of the floor into a small chamber but I cant stop long. Those creatures could still find me so
I need to find a wat out.

I was stupid. Tried to sneak past one of the creatures but it saw me and attacked. I managed to hide up here but I'm
losing enough blood to know I'm not going to make it. 
But there's something New Terra needs to know. When I first climbed into the temple, there was a still working console 
with an interactive hologram. I couldn't get close as those creatures were chasing me. If you find this, upload it to UCH
Command. I want them to know what's down here, so this wasn't all for nothing. Good luck - Kara

Welcome back, Joe. I see you've already made a name for yourself as {PlayerName}. 

I have a thousand questions about what happened. Unfortunately, the celebration in honor of your return will have to wait a bit longer. Things are escalating quickly, but I wanted to see if it was really you and personally welcome you back. 

You must have a lot of questions yourself!
What went wrong with Operation Phoenix?
What happened after you took off?
Do you want to know anything else? \n\nI'm quite busy at the moment, but I'll make time for you.

She arrived here safe and sound. Together with other former UCH members from <color=#ffffff>GLaD</color>, they are currently staying at the nearby <color=#eeff00>drone base</color>. 
I managed to convince Alex to step in as interim commander since we've recently had a number of personnel go missing. At least until GLaD can reorganize itself. You shouldn't keep her waiting. 

She's in <color=#eeff00>her office</color> over there.

I'm afraid she isn't here. I've lost contact with her, unfortunately. 
I haven't heard from her in quite some time, and I'm a bit concerned. 

However, we recently received an encrypted message from her organization.

Yes, the <color=#ffffff>Galactic Liberation and Defense </color>(GLaD). To put it briefly, after we arrived here, we were divided on how to proceed. 

Alex and a few others decided to seek their fortune out in the galaxy. They believed they could achieve more, both for us and for this galaxy in which we're stranded. 

I think she was mainly looking for you. I let her go.

Basically, everything went wrong. After we arrived here, we were attacked by <color=#ffffff>Zirax</color> forces. We barely managed to escape. <color=#ffffff>Admiral Brenner</color> sacrificed himself and the <color=#ffffff>TITAN</color> to buy us enough time. \n\nWe found this solar system and, in the meantime, have made a few allies. For example, the <color=#ffffff>Arkenian Republic</color>.

As far as we know, the warp vortex formed prematurely and irregularly. It interfered with our warp drives and threw us into Andromeda, instead of reaching Proxima Centauri as planned. There are a few uncertainties here. However, only <color=#ffffff>Mercer Senior</color> and <color=#ffffff>Admiral Yaden</color> could shed light on them. Both have been missing since the battle. We don't know if they survived. They're currently listed as Missing in Action, like so many others. The memorial here in the capital city reminds us every day of their sacrifice.

We—meaning the military administration and the council—are focused on surviving here and either finding a way back or establishing a new home for humanity. There's still no consensus on this. For now, we're running the base as a military outpost on high alert. \n\nHowever, as support for <color=#ffffff>New Terra</color> grows, we may eventually transition to a civilian-led colony.

You should speak with Alex over at the <color=#eeff00>drone base</color>. 

She probably has a lot she could use help with. Unfortunately, many things around here are still quite makeshift.

Her office is over there on the command level, second floor.
There's nothing pressing at the moment. Maybe you have other tasks waiting for you. Take a look around. \n\nI'll contact you immediately if something comes up.

Nothing official, really. And much of it is just rumors. \n\nBut in our last conversation, Alex mentioned a few things she was investigating in the <color=#eeff00>Ellyon</color> and <color=#eeff00>Ashon</color> systems.
Aid for the Talon on <color=#eeff00>Akua </color>(Ellyon System)
Raid on a trading station at <color=#eeff00>Ashon II</color> (Ashon System)

According to reports, there's a ruin on Akua that no one dares to enter, but it could be of great historical importance to the <color=#ffffff>Talon</color>. Since the Talon helped some of us escape from the Ellyon system, it would be an excellent opportunity to repay the favor. \n\nThe <color=#ffffff>village chief</color> in one of the larger settlements would be the person to speak with.

One of our Arkenian friends has apparently reported to GLaD that their research station on Ningues has barely been sending reports anymore. And the ones that do get through mention some kind of artifact that's interacting with the local inhabitants. It's all very confusing. They're looking for a neutral observer to investigate the situation on-site without it appearing to be a state intervention. \n\nFind the <color=#ffffff>research station</color> and speak with the <color=#ffffff>station leader</color> there.

On Masperon, a Zirax Commander is looking for various supplies and a trader to deliver them. That wouldn't be unusual, except the list makes no sense for such an isolated outpost. The troops are from the Abyssal House. As far as we know, they're probably exiles. There's something strange going on, and it should be investigated. \n\nA Zirax named ‘<color=#ffffff>Ikkenz</color>' is listed as the responsible contact in the base.

The report of a large pirate ship attempting to land secretly on Skillon was initially set aside. However, the individuals involved may be working on behalf of the <color=#ffffff>Salurian </color>crime syndicate. Since they're becoming an increasing threat in our part of the galaxy, it would be beneficial for us to gain some insight into their operations. \n\nThe position of ‘<color=#ffffff>La Grande Maira</color>' should be easy to locate with a scanner.

A report of battles in the Ashon system, intercepted by agents, suggests a raid by a Warlord. The trading station in orbit of Ashon II's hellworld sent a distress signal and then went silent. It would be ideal if we could win the Prenn Federation as allies by assisting with this situation. \n\nExpect a difficult encounter.
